name: Asiago Bread Bowl Dip (AKA The Best Appetizer EVER!)
author: Holly Hasten Jarovsky
summary: This cheese dip is AMAZING! I get compliments and requests for the recipe every time I make it. Use aluminum foil to cover bread bowl while baking if cheese begins to darken too quickly. Serve with Wheat Thins.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend
1 (18 ounce) loaf round bread loaf, hollowed to make a bowl
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir cream cheese, Italian cheese blend, mayonnaise, onion powder, and garlic powder together in a bowl; scoop into bread bowl
Bake in preheated oven until heated through, 90 minutes to 2 hours
